author: David Gilbert, VICE News
title: India Is Spraying Migrant Workers With Bleach Disinfectant During Coronavirus Lockdown
description: The disinfectant is usually used to sanitize buses.
content:
Thousands of migrant workers in India have been sprayed with a bleach disinfectant after they returned home during the countrys coronavirus lockdown.
 Video captured by a reporter in the northern city of Bareilly shows migrants forced to sit on the ground af… [+2335 chars]
